                      SourceSet set,
                      Action<? super JavaCompile> configure)
        Description copied from interface: LanguageSupport.TaskHandler
        Configure the task for the specified SourceSet. The dependent plugin for the task may not yet be applied, so the configuration should be guaranteed to be applied after the plugin is applied.

        Parameters:
        project - Project that is being built out
        set - SourceSet to configure the task for
